00031 CPSplitViewDidResizeSubviewsNotification = @"CPSplitViewDidResizeSubviewsNotification";

00035     CPSplitViewVerticalImage = nil;

00041 @implementation CPSplitView : CPView

00045     BOOL        _isPaneSplitter;

00061     @ignore

00063 + (void)initialize
00064 {
00065     if (self != [CPSplitView class])
00066         return;
00067 
00068     var bundle = [CPBundle bundleForClass:self];
00069     CPSplitViewHorizontalImage = [[CPImage alloc] initWithContentsOfFile:[bundle pathForResource:@"CPSplitView/CPSplitViewHorizontal.png"] size:CPSizeMake(5.0, 10.0)];
00070     CPSplitViewVerticalImage = [[CPImage alloc] initWithContentsOfFile:[bundle pathForResource:@"CPSplitView/CPSplitViewVertical.png"] size:CPSizeMake(10.0, 5.0)];
00071 }

00073 - (id)initWithFrame:(CGRect)aFrame
00074 {
00075     if (self = [super initWithFrame:aFrame])
00076     {
00077         _currentDivider = CPNotFound;
00078         
00079         _DOMDividerElements = [];
00080         
00081         [self _setVertical:YES];
00082     }
00083     
00084     return self;
00085 }
00086 
00087 - (float)dividerThickness
00088 {
00089     return _isPaneSplitter ? 1.0 : 10.0;
00090 }
00091 
00092 - (BOOL)isVertical
00093 {
00094     return _isVertical;
00095 }
00096 
00097 - (void)setVertical:(BOOL)shouldBeVertical
00098 {
00099     if (![self _setVertical:shouldBeVertical])
00100         return;
00101     
00102     // Just re-adjust evenly.
00103     var frame = [self frame],
00104         dividerThickness = [self dividerThickness];
00105     
00106     [self _postNotificationWillResize];
00107     
00108     var eachSize = ROUND((frame.size[_sizeComponent] - dividerThickness * (_subviews.length - 1)) / _subviews.length),
00109         index = 0,
00110         count = _subviews.length;
00111 
00112     if ([self isVertical])
00113         for (; index < count; ++index)
00114             [_subviews[index] setFrame:CGRectMake(ROUND((eachSize + dividerThickness) * index), 0, eachSize, frame.size.height)];
00115     else
00116         for (; index < count; ++index)
00117             [_subviews[index] setFrame:CGRectMake(0, ROUND((eachSize + dividerThickness) * index), frame.size.width, eachSize)];
00118     
00119     [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00120     
00121     [self _postNotificationDidResize];
00122 
00123 }
00124 
00125 - (BOOL)_setVertical:(BOOL)shouldBeVertical
00126 {
00127     var changed = (_isVertical != shouldBeVertical);
00128     
00129     _isVertical = shouldBeVertical;
00130     
00131     _originComponent = [self isVertical] ? "x" : "y";
00132     _sizeComponent = [self isVertical] ? "width" : "height";
00133     _dividerImagePath = [self isVertical] ? [CPSplitViewVerticalImage filename] : [CPSplitViewHorizontalImage filename];
00134     
00135     return changed;
00136 }
00137 
00138 - (BOOL)isPaneSplitter
00139 {
00140     return _isPaneSplitter;
00141 }
00142 
00143 - (void)setIsPaneSplitter:(BOOL)shouldBePaneSplitter
00144 {
00145     if (_isPaneSplitter == shouldBePaneSplitter)
00146         return;
00147 
00148     _isPaneSplitter = shouldBePaneSplitter;
00149 
00150     if(_DOMDividerElements[_drawingDivider])
00151         [self _setupDOMDivider]
00152 
00153     // The divider changes size when pane splitter mode is toggled, so the 
00154     // subviews need to change size too.
00155     _needsResizeSubviews = YES;
00156     [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00157 }
00158 
00159 - (void)didAddSubview:(CPView)aSubview
00160 {
00161     _needsResizeSubviews = YES;
00162 }
00163 
00164 - (BOOL)isSubviewCollapsed:(CPView)subview
00165 {
00166     return [subview frame].size[_sizeComponent] < 1 ? YES : NO;
00167 }
00168 
00169 - (CGRect)rectOfDividerAtIndex:(int)aDivider
00170 {
00171     var frame = [_subviews[aDivider] frame],
00172         rect = CGRectMakeZero();
00173     
00174     rect.size = [self frame].size;
00175     
00176     rect.size[_sizeComponent] = [self dividerThickness];
00177     rect.origin[_originComponent] = frame.origin[_originComponent] + frame.size[_sizeComponent];
00178 
00179     return rect;
00180 }
00181 
00182 - (CGRect)effectiveRectOfDividerAtIndex:(int)aDivider
00183 {
00184     var realRect = [self rectOfDividerAtIndex:aDivider];
00185     
00186     var padding = 2;
00187     
00188     realRect.size[_sizeComponent] += padding * 2;
00189     realRect.origin[_originComponent] -= padding;
00190     
00191     return realRect;
00192 }
00193 
00194 - (void)drawRect:(CGRect)rect
00195 {
00196     var count = [_subviews count] - 1;
00197     
00198     while ((count--) > 0)
00199     {
00200         _drawingDivider = count;
00201         [self drawDividerInRect:[self rectOfDividerAtIndex:count]];
00202     }
00203 }
00204 
00205 - (void)drawDividerInRect:(CGRect)aRect
00206 {
00207 #if PLATFORM(DOM)
00208     if (!_DOMDividerElements[_drawingDivider])
00209     {
00210         _DOMDividerElements[_drawingDivider] = document.createElement("div");
00211         _DOMDividerElements[_drawingDivider].style.cursor = "move";
00212         _DOMDividerElements[_drawingDivider].style.position = "absolute";
00213         _DOMDividerElements[_drawingDivider].style.backgroundRepeat = "repeat";
00214 
00215         CPDOMDisplayServerAppendChild(_DOMElement, _DOMDividerElements[_drawingDivider]);
00216 
00217         [self _setupDOMDivider];
00218     }    
00219 
00220     CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleLeftTop(_DOMDividerElements[_drawingDivider], NULL, _CGRectGetMinX(aRect), _CGRectGetMinY(aRect));
00221     CPDOMDisplayServerSetStyleSize(_DOMDividerElements[_drawingDivider], _CGRectGetWidth(aRect), _CGRectGetHeight(aRect));
00222 #endif
00223 }
00224 
00225 - (void)_setupDOMDivider
00226 {
00227     if (_isPaneSplitter)
00228     {
00229         _DOMDividerElements[_drawingDivider].style.backgroundColor = "#A5A5A5";
00230         _DOMDividerElements[_drawingDivider].style.backgroundImage = "";
00231     }
00232     else
00233     {
00234         _DOMDividerElements[_drawingDivider].style.backgroundColor = "";
00235         _DOMDividerElements[_drawingDivider].style.backgroundImage = "url('"+_dividerImagePath+"')";
00236     }
00237 }
00238 
00239 - (void)viewWillDraw
00240 {
00241     [self _adjustSubviewsWithCalculatedSize];
00242 }
00243 
00244 - (void)_adjustSubviewsWithCalculatedSize
00245 {
00246     if (!_needsResizeSubviews)
00247         return;
00248     
00249     _needsResizeSubviews = NO;
00250         
00251     var subviews = [self subviews],
00252         count = subviews.length,
00253         oldSize = CGSizeMakeZero();
00254     
00255     if ([self isVertical])
00256     {
00257         oldSize.width += [self dividerThickness] * (count - 1);
00258         oldSize.height = CGRectGetHeight([self frame]);
00259     }
00260     else
00261     {
00262         oldSize.width = CGRectGetWidth([self frame]);
00263         oldSize.height += [self dividerThickness] * (count - 1);
00264     }
00265         
00266     while (count--)
00267         oldSize[_sizeComponent] += [subviews[count] frame].size[_sizeComponent];
00268     
00269     [self resizeSubviewsWithOldSize:oldSize];
00270 }
00271 
00272 - (BOOL)cursorAtPoint:(CPPoint)aPoint hitDividerAtIndex:(int)anIndex
00273 {
00274     var frame = [_subviews[anIndex] frame],
00275         startPosition = frame.origin[_originComponent] + frame.size[_sizeComponent],
00276         effectiveRect = [self effectiveRectOfDividerAtIndex:anIndex],
00277         additionalRect = null;
00278     
00279     if ([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitView:effectiveRect:forDrawnRect:ofDividerAtIndex:)])
00280         effectiveRect = [_delegate splitView:self effectiveRect:effectiveRect forDrawnRect:effectiveRect ofDividerAtIndex:anIndex];
00281     
00282     if ([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitView:additionalEffectiveRectOfDividerAtIndex:)])
00283         additionalRect = [_delegate splitView:self additionalEffectiveRectOfDividerAtIndex:anIndex];
00284 
00285     return CGRectContainsPoint(effectiveRect, aPoint) || (additionalRect && CGRectContainsPoint(additionalRect, aPoint));
00286 }
00287 
00288 - (CPView)hitTest:(CGPoint)aPoint
00289 {
00290     if ([self isHidden] || ![self hitTests] || !CGRectContainsPoint([self frame], aPoint))
00291         return nil;
00292     
00293     var point = [self convertPoint:aPoint fromView:[self superview]];
00294     
00295     var count = [_subviews count] - 1;
00296     for (var i = 0; i < count; i++)
00297     {
00298         if ([self cursorAtPoint:point hitDividerAtIndex:i])
00299             return self;
00300     }
00301     
00302     return [super hitTest:aPoint];
00303 }
00304 
00305 /*
00306     Tracks the divider.
00307     @param anEvent the input event
00308 */
00309 - (void)trackDivider:(CPEvent)anEvent
00310 {
00311     var type = [anEvent type];
00312 
00313     if (type == CPLeftMouseUp)
00314     {
00315         if (_currentDivider != CPNotFound)
00316         {
00317             _currentDivider = CPNotFound;
00318             [self _postNotificationDidResize];
00319         }
00320         
00321         return;
00322     }
00323     
00324     if (type == CPLeftMouseDown)
00325     {
00326         var point = [self convertPoint:[anEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil];
00327 
00328         _currentDivider = CPNotFound;
00329         var count = [_subviews count] - 1;
00330         for (var i = 0; i < count; i++)
00331         {
00332             var frame = [_subviews[i] frame],
00333                 startPosition = frame.origin[_originComponent] + frame.size[_sizeComponent];
00334 
00335             if ([self cursorAtPoint:point hitDividerAtIndex:i])
00336             {
00337                 if ([anEvent clickCount] == 2 &&
00338                     [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitView:canCollapseSubview:)] &&
00339                     [_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitView:shouldCollapseSubview:forDoubleClickOnDividerAtIndex:)])
00340                 {    
00341                     var minPosition = [self minPossiblePositionOfDividerAtIndex:i],
00342                         maxPosition = [self maxPossiblePositionOfDividerAtIndex:i];
00343 
00344                     if ([_delegate splitView:self canCollapseSubview:_subviews[i]] && [_delegate splitView:self shouldCollapseSubview:_subviews[i] forDoubleClickOnDividerAtIndex:i])
00345                     {
00346                         if ([self isSubviewCollapsed:_subviews[i]])
00347                             [self setPosition:(minPosition + (maxPosition - minPosition) / 2) ofDividerAtIndex:i];
00348                         else
00349                             [self setPosition:minPosition ofDividerAtIndex:i];
00350                     }
00351                     else if ([_delegate splitView:self canCollapseSubview:_subviews[i+1]] && [_delegate splitView:self shouldCollapseSubview:_subviews[i+1] forDoubleClickOnDividerAtIndex:i])
00352                     {
00353                         if ([self isSubviewCollapsed:_subviews[i+1]])
00354                             [self setPosition:(minPosition + (maxPosition - minPosition) / 2) ofDividerAtIndex:i];
00355                         else
00356                             [self setPosition:maxPosition ofDividerAtIndex:i];
00357                     }
00358                 }
00359                 else
00360                 {
00361                     _currentDivider = i;
00362                     _initialOffset = startPosition - point[_originComponent];
00363 
00364                     [self _postNotificationWillResize];
00365                 }
00366             }
00367         }
00368 
00369         if (_currentDivider === CPNotFound)
00370             return;
00371     }
00372     
00373     else if (type == CPLeftMouseDragged && _currentDivider != CPNotFound)
00374     {
00375         var point = [self convertPoint:[anEvent locationInWindow] fromView:nil];
00376         
00377         [self setPosition:(point[_originComponent] + _initialOffset) ofDividerAtIndex:_currentDivider];
00378     }
00379     
00380     [CPApp setTarget:self selector:@selector(trackDivider:) forNextEventMatchingMask:CPLeftMouseDraggedMask | CPLeftMouseUpMask untilDate:nil inMode:nil dequeue:YES];
00381 }
00382 
00383 - (void)mouseDown:(CPEvent)anEvent
00384 {
00385     // FIXME: This should not trap events if not on a divider!
00386     [self trackDivider:anEvent];
00387 }
00388 
00389 - (float)maxPossiblePositionOfDividerAtIndex:(int)dividerIndex
00390 {
00391     var frame = [_subviews[dividerIndex + 1] frame];
00392     
00393     if (dividerIndex + 1 < [_subviews count] - 1)
00394         return frame.origin[_originComponent] + frame.size[_sizeComponent] - [self dividerThickness];
00395     else    
00396         return [self frame].size[_sizeComponent] - [self dividerThickness];
00397 }
00398 
00399 - (float)minPossiblePositionOfDividerAtIndex:(int)dividerIndex
00400 {
00401     if (dividerIndex > 0)
00402     {
00403         var frame = [_subviews[dividerIndex - 1] frame];
00404         
00405         return frame.origin[_originComponent] + frame.size[_sizeComponent] + [self dividerThickness];
00406     }
00407     else    
00408         return 0;
00409 }
00410 
00411 - (void)setPosition:(float)position ofDividerAtIndex:(int)dividerIndex
00412 {
00413     [self _adjustSubviewsWithCalculatedSize];
00414         
00415     // not sure where this should override other positions?
00416     if ([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitView:constrainSplitPosition:ofSubviewAt:)])
00417         position = [_delegate splitView:self constrainSplitPosition:position ofSubviewAt:dividerIndex];
00418 
00419     var proposedMax = [self maxPossiblePositionOfDividerAtIndex:dividerIndex],
00420         proposedMin = [self minPossiblePositionOfDividerAtIndex:dividerIndex],
00421         actualMax = proposedMax,
00422         actualMin = proposedMin;
00423         
00424     if([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitView:constrainMinCoordinate:ofSubviewAt:)])
00425         actualMin = [_delegate splitView:self constrainMinCoordinate:proposedMin ofSubviewAt:dividerIndex];
00426         
00427     if([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitView:constrainMaxCoordinate:ofSubviewAt:)])
00428         actualMax = [_delegate splitView:self constrainMaxCoordinate:proposedMax ofSubviewAt:dividerIndex];
00429 
00430     var frame = [self frame],
00431         viewA = _subviews[dividerIndex],
00432         frameA = [viewA frame],
00433         viewB = _subviews[dividerIndex + 1],
00434         frameB = [viewB frame];
00435 
00436     var realPosition = MAX(MIN(position, actualMax), actualMin);
00437     
00438     if (position <  proposedMin + (actualMin - proposedMin) / 2)
00439         if ([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitView:canCollapseSubview:)])
00440             if ([_delegate splitView:self canCollapseSubview:viewA])
00441                 realPosition = proposedMin;
00442     
00443     frameA.size[_sizeComponent] = realPosition - frameA.origin[_originComponent];
00444     [_subviews[dividerIndex] setFrame:frameA];
00445     
00446     frameB.size[_sizeComponent] = frameB.origin[_originComponent] + frameB.size[_sizeComponent] - realPosition - [self dividerThickness];
00447     frameB.origin[_originComponent] = realPosition + [self dividerThickness];
00448     [_subviews[dividerIndex + 1] setFrame:frameB];
00449     
00450     [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00451 }
00452 
00453 - (void)setFrameSize:(CGSize)aSize
00454 {
00455     [self _adjustSubviewsWithCalculatedSize];
00456         
00457     [super setFrameSize:aSize];
00458     
00459     [self setNeedsDisplay:YES];
00460 }
00461 
00462 - (void)resizeSubviewsWithOldSize:(CPSize)oldSize
00463 {   
00464     if ([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitView:resizeSubviewsWithOldSize:)])
00465     {
00466         [_delegate splitView:self resizeSubviewsWithOldSize:oldSize];
00467         return;
00468     }
00469 
00470     [self _postNotificationWillResize];
00471     
00472     var index = 0,
00473         count = [_subviews count],
00474         bounds = [self bounds],
00475         dividerThickness = [self dividerThickness],
00476         totalDividers = count - 1,
00477         totalSizableSpace = 0,
00478         nonSizableSpace = 0,
00479         lastSizableIndex = -1,
00480         totalSizablePanes = 0,
00481         isVertical = [self isVertical];
00482 
00483     for (index = 0; index < count; ++index)
00484     {
00485         var view = _subviews[index],
00486             isSizable = isVertical ? [view autoresizingMask] & CPViewWidthSizable : [view autoresizingMask] & CPViewHeightSizable;
00487 
00488         if (isSizable)
00489         {
00490             totalSizableSpace += [view frame].size[_sizeComponent];
00491             lastSizableIndex = index;
00492             totalSizablePanes++;
00493         }
00494     }
00495 
00496     if (totalSizablePanes === count)
00497         totalSizableSpace = 0;
00498 
00499     var nonSizableSpace = totalSizableSpace ? bounds.size[_sizeComponent] - totalSizableSpace : 0,
00500         remainingFlexibleSpace = bounds.size[_sizeComponent] - oldSize[_sizeComponent],
00501         oldDimension = (oldSize[_sizeComponent]- totalDividers*dividerThickness - nonSizableSpace),
00502         ratio = oldDimension <= 0 ? 0 : (bounds.size[_sizeComponent] - totalDividers*dividerThickness - nonSizableSpace) / oldDimension;
00503 
00504     for (index = 0; index < count; ++index)
00505     {
00506         var view = _subviews[index],
00507             viewFrame = CGRectMakeCopy(bounds),
00508             isSizable = isVertical ? [view autoresizingMask] & CPViewWidthSizable : [view autoresizingMask] & CPViewHeightSizable;
00509 
00510             if (index + 1 == count)
00511                 viewFrame.size[_sizeComponent] = bounds.size[_sizeComponent] - viewFrame.origin[_originComponent];
00512             else if (totalSizableSpace && isSizable && lastSizableIndex === index)
00513                 viewFrame.size[_sizeComponent] = MAX(0, ROUND([view frame].size[_sizeComponent] + remainingFlexibleSpace))
00514             else if (isSizable || !totalSizableSpace)
00515             {
00516                 viewFrame.size[_sizeComponent] = MAX(0, ROUND(ratio * [view frame].size[_sizeComponent]));
00517                 remainingFlexibleSpace -= (viewFrame.size[_sizeComponent] - [view frame].size[_sizeComponent]);
00518             }
00519             else if (totalSizableSpace && !isSizable)
00520                 viewFrame.size[_sizeComponent] = [view frame].size[_sizeComponent];
00521 
00522         bounds.origin[_originComponent] += viewFrame.size[_sizeComponent] + dividerThickness;        
00523 
00524         [view setFrame:viewFrame];
00525     }
00526 
00527     [self _postNotificationDidResize];
00528 }
00529 
00530 - (void)setDelegate:(id)delegate
00531 {
00532     if ([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitViewDidResizeSubviews:)])
00533         [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter] removeObserver:_delegate name:CPSplitViewDidResizeSubviewsNotification object:self];
00534     if ([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitViewWillResizeSubviews:)])
00535         [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter] removeObserver:_delegate name:CPSplitViewWillResizeSubviewsNotification object:self];
00536     
00537    _delegate = delegate;
00538 
00539    if ([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitViewDidResizeSubviews:)])
00540        [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter] addObserver:_delegate
00541                                                 selector:@selector(splitViewDidResizeSubviews:)
00542                                                     name:CPSplitViewDidResizeSubviewsNotification
00543                                                   object:self];
00544    if ([_delegate respondsToSelector:@selector(splitViewWillResizeSubviews:)])
00545        [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter] addObserver:_delegate
00546                                                 selector:@selector(splitViewWillResizeSubviews:)
00547                                                     name:CPSplitViewWillResizeSubviewsNotification
00548                                                   object:self];
00549 }
00550 
00551 - (void)_postNotificationWillResize
00552 {
00553     [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter] postNotificationName:CPSplitViewWillResizeSubviewsNotification object:self];
00554 }
00555 
00556 - (void)_postNotificationDidResize
00557 {
00558     [[CPNotificationCenter defaultCenter] postNotificationName:CPSplitViewDidResizeSubviewsNotification object:self];
00559 }

00563 var CPSplitViewDelegateKey          = "CPSplitViewDelegateKey",
00564     CPSplitViewIsVerticalKey        = "CPSplitViewIsVerticalKey",
00565     CPSplitViewIsPaneSplitterKey    = "CPSplitViewIsPaneSplitterKey";
00566 
00567 @implementation CPSplitView (CPCoding)
00568 
00569 /*
00570     Initializes the split view by unarchiving data from \c aCoder.
00571     @param aCoder the coder containing the archived CPSplitView.
00572 */
00573 - (id)initWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
00574 {
00575     self = [super initWithCoder:aCoder];
00576     
00577     if (self)
00578     {
00579         _currentDivider = CPNotFound;
00580         
00581         _DOMDividerElements = [];
00582         
00583         _delegate = [aCoder decodeObjectForKey:CPSplitViewDelegateKey];;
00584         
00585         _isPaneSplitter = [aCoder decodeBoolForKey:CPSplitViewIsPaneSplitterKey];
00586         [self _setVertical:[aCoder decodeBoolForKey:CPSplitViewIsVerticalKey]];
00587     }
00588     
00589     return self;
00590 }
00591 
00592 /*
00593     Archives this split view into the provided coder.
00594     @param aCoder the coder to which the button's instance data will be written.
00595 */
00596 - (void)encodeWithCoder:(CPCoder)aCoder
00597 {
00598     [super encodeWithCoder:aCoder];
00599     
00600     [aCoder encodeConditionalObject:_delegate forKey:CPSplitViewDelegateKey];
00601     
00602     [aCoder encodeBool:_isVertical forKey:CPSplitViewIsVerticalKey];
00603     [aCoder encodeBool:_isPaneSplitter forKey:CPSplitViewIsPaneSplitterKey];
00604 }
